Credit.title: About us
Credit.infoAboutMe: My name is Kry≈°tof Marcol. I‚Äôm an 18-year-old student from the Czech Republic with a growing passion for technology and modern web development. I enjoy creating progressive web applications (PWAs) using Next.js, exploring new tools, and improving my skills through hands-on projects. Outside of coding, I love football and video games‚Äîthey help me relax, stay creative, and keep a good balance between school and development.
Credit.appDescription1: This application is designed to help families stay organized and connected every day.
Credit.appDescription2: It centralizes all important family responsibilities such as events, chores, shopping tasks, and expenses in one simple and clean interface.
Credit.appDescription3: The goal is to reduce everyday stress and help each family member clearly see what needs to be done.
Credit.featureCalendar: Shared family calendar for all events
Credit.supportText1: I built this application as a personal project to help families stay organized, communicate better, and make daily life easier.
Credit.supportText2: Every feature, page, and detail is handcrafted with care to create a clean and modern experience.
Credit.supportText3: If this app helps you or your family, your support truly means a lot to me.
Credit.supportFeedback: Share your feedback so I can keep improving the app
Credit.supportShare: Share the app with friends, family, or other communities
Credit.supportDonate: Support the project through a small donation if you wish
Credit.donateButton: Click here to support the project

ChangeName.title: Change name
ChangeName.dialogDesc: Enter a new name below and click submit.

DeleteAccount.title: Delete Account
DeleteAccount.desc: Your account will be permanently deleted
DeleteAccount.dialogDesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data (expenses, calendars, and shopping lists). Family data will remain intact.

Donate.title: Support the Family App
Donate.subtitle: If this app helps your family stay organized, a small donation helps me keep building it with love.
Donate.p1: Hi! I'm Kry≈°tof, the creator of this app. I built it to make daily family life easier ‚Äî calendars, chores, shopping lists, expenses and more.
Donate.p2: This project is fully independent. Your support helps me maintain servers, add new features, and keep the core of this app free for everyone.
Donate.p3: If you enjoy using it, consider supporting it with a small donation. It truly means a lot.
Donate.footer: Every contribution helps keep this project alive and growing. Thank you for your support!
Donate.successMessage: Every contribution helps keep this project alive and growing. Thank you for your support!
